content: this is a seamless sweater knit top down with raglan increases it is knit using two strands of finull from rauma color 4134 held together with one strand of tynn slik mohair from sandnes color 2511 using in total 450 grams finull and 100 grams of silk mohair alternative yarn could be replacing two strands of finull with one strand of fivel would then use approx 400 grams
